alert.note: Alert for Chelan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 26 at 9:48PM PDT until June 29 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Spokane WA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Washington... Stehekin River at Stehekin affecting Chelan County. For the Stehekin River...including Stehekin...minor flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. * WHERE...Stehekin River at Stehekin. * WHEN...From Monday evening to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, The river may be out of its banks in spots on parts of Stehekin Valley Road and Company Creek Road, especially from Harlequin Bridge to about seven miles upstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM PDT Sunday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 pm PDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Stehekin River Stehekin 24.0 22.5 Sun 8 pm PDT 24.1 24.1 23.2 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next product will be issued by Monday afternoon at 515 PM PDT.
